name: Kaiser Glider - Golden Burst
text: (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Kaiser Glider - Golden Burst" once per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this card's ATK becomes that monster's current ATK until the end of this turn.
